Tool

NameDiffusive Hillslope Evolution (ADI)
ID4
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013
Specificationgrid

Description

Simulation of diffusive hillslope evolution using an Alternating-Direction-Implicit (ADI) method. References: Pelletier, J.D. (2008): Quantitative Modeling of Earth Surface Processes. Cambridge, 295p.
